meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #2648.

td.p: Brian Gondos, a sophomore from the University of Pennsylvania
Vandana Madhavan, a sophomore from Harvard University
Bill Lee, a sophomore from the University of Washington

tr.td: THE PLANETS
CELEBRITY ALUMNI
TRAVEL U.S.A.
PASTIMES
ANCIENT ROME
COMMON BONDS
